name: Soul Matter
description:
Soul Matter was developed within 72 hours during Ludum Dare 40 by Nehvis (Programming & Art) and Draquise (Music & Art). In Soul Matter every choice matters and  influences the outcome of the game.

Controls keyboard:

  • WASD - Walk
  • Space - Interact
  • Enter - Attack
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Left/Right - Toggle inventory

Controls gamepad:

  • Left stick - Walk
  • A - Interact
  • X - Attack
  • B - Sprint
  • RB/LB - Toggle inventory
